        Parameters:
        userInput - include cities user want to visit. In this class we only allow two, and also could have searching condition like max price and flight duration
        Returns:
        the collection of ticket that satisfy the condition

      • generateList

        public TripLinkedList generateList(java.util.List<java.lang.String> userInput)
        given the user input which include like which city they want to visit and how long they stay, return the tripLinkedList. TripLinkedList is like a graph to store the source data.
        Specified by:
        generateList in interface IFlightTicketService
        Parameters:
        userInput - the user input from main method which conclude the query condition
        Returns:
        the trip linked list for this flight route

      • getRoute

        public java.util.List<IFlight> getRoute(java.util.List<java.lang.String> userInput,
                                        double priceWeight)
        Given the user input, and also have the priceWeight which indicate how to measure the ticket rank. Get the itinerary base on user input and also the way we measure the rank
        Specified by:
        getRoute in interface IFlightTicketService
        Parameters:
        userInput - include list of cities user want to go and how long they stay
        priceWeight - how much price would contribute to rank of the ticket
        Returns:
        the list of tickets for this route

        getTickets in interface IFlightTicketService
        Parameters:
        startAirport - start airport
        endAirport - end airport
        date - the date on these flight
        Returns:

        Parameters:
